presentation: I am a Information Systems student and have been working with programming for over a year. I have a proactive profile, focused on bringing innovation and organization to the work environment. I am proficient in languages such as Python, JavaScript, and Java, with solid experience in MySQL, HTML, CSS, and Bootstrap. Additionally, I am familiar with C, C++, and Haskell.

formations.learningCenter: Federal Institute of Education, Science, and Technology of Bahia

professionalExperiences.company: Federal Institute of Education, Science, and Technology of Bahia
professionalExperiences.responsibilities: My activities involved instructing students about important concepts in the Java programming language, such as Exceptions (Try/Catch), Threads, Generics, Collections, I/O (Input/Output), and JavaFX. Additionally, I was responsible for addressing specific questions regarding the creation of assignments and academic projects, as well as assisting with assessment tasks.

professionalExperiences.company: Municipal Health Department of Vitória da Conquista
professionalExperiences.responsibilities: My tasks involved the complete development of web applications, including requirements analysis, data collection, documentation, prototyping, code development, and application deployment. In building applications, I primarily used programming languages such as Python with the Flask framework and JavaScript. Specifically for the front-end, I utilized HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, and JavaScript libraries like AJAX.

personalProjects.title: BabyDiet
personalProjects.description: A Flask application focused on processing Excel spreadsheets to generate labels with information about baby feeding schedules. The user uploads the spreadsheet, and the system evaluates the pattern and data completeness, providing feedback. If compliant, the labels are displayed and can be downloaded in text or Excel format. Submissions are recorded in the history with an identifier and timestamp.

personalProjects.title: PyBank
personalProjects.description: A financial data analysis system developed in Python, using Pandas and Matplotlib libraries. The system allows users to perform common banking operations such as withdrawals, deposits, and inquiries. Additionally, it can generate tables in CSV and XLSX formats with information about financial data. The system also provides features for visualizing graphs and statistics related to all operations and flows in the account.

personalProjects.title: TicTacToe
personalProjects.description: A Tic-Tac-Toe game developed in Java using Swing and AWT libraries. The game offers users the ability to play against another player through a user-friendly graphical interface, including a scoreboard and configuration options such as clearing the scoreboard and resetting the game.

personalProjects.title: TwinChat Server
personalProjects.description: A server built in FastAPI with integrated artificial intelligence to answer fitness-related questions, providing information about training, diet, and general inquiries.
